item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 29, 2025 at 1:20 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Koto Programming Language (17 points | 9 comments)
3. Chimpanzees act as 'engineers', choosing materials to make tools (18 points | 14 comments)

9. Conquest of the Incas (73 points | 50 comments)

20. Decomposing a Factorial into Large Factors (119 points | 24 comments)

22. The Biology of B-Movie Monsters (2003) (87 points | 43 comments)
23. Noise cancellation improves turn-taking for AI Voice Agents (100 points | 38 comments)
24. xAI has acquired X, xAI now valued at $80B (635 points | 859 comments)
25. The Real Story Behind Sam Altman’s Firing From OpenAI (14 points | 1 comment)
26. The Curious Case of Beam CPU Usage (2019) (17 points | 3 comments)
27. MilliForth-6502: The smallest Forth real programming language for 6502 (117 points | 32 comments)
28. Where Do the Bytes Go? (21 points | 1 comment)
29. How to write blog posts that developers read (480 points | 140 comments)
30. Finley (YC W21) Is Hiring a Technical Implementations Specialist ( | hide)
